https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h8R0PzbpDiadYuYKTCfOARHFAdg.jpg The HBO Sports documentary Broad Street Bullies, a look at one of pro sportâ€™s most polarizing teams, the legendary Philadelphia Flyers Stanley Cup championship squads of the 1970s. This exclusive presentation tells the backstories of these engaging and colorful athletes, who won back-to-back Stanley Cups in 1974 and 1975 with a bold, aggressive style that sparked controversy and criticism.
